item.title: Devolution Problems!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hey Guys,
Im Using Devolution 7.0 And I Have The Following Problems After Days Of Trying To Fix Or Work Out How To Do, All Help Would Be Appreciated.
1-I Spawned Some Npcs And Now ALL My Npcs Hit 0, Ive Changed Their Location And Stats So Thats Not The Problem
2-How To Stop All Interfaces Coming Up Whilst In A Duel Like ::player, report abuse, bank All Those Sorts Of Interfaces.
3-Code For Autokick ::Noclip And Autoban ::Setitem
4-Making ::Worldshop Work For Everyone Not Just Admins Even Though I Put Player Rights 0 (Everyone)…This Is All I Have So Far.
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“worldshop”) && playerRights > 0) {
openUpShop(22);
}

All Help Would Be Appreciated

Thanx!

Read full topic
